description: You must be from L.A. or New York. Please stay away. Or get up to speed by attending a game at Fenway and watching the movie “Singles.”
You would definitely be considered a transplant in either place, but you have good taste in cities. We suggest you learn to wear socks with your sandals while drinking Narragansett beer.
Born and bred in the Northwest or Northeast. No doubting your loyalties. You either don’t pronounce the ‘R’s’ in Harvard or know your way around a geoduck, or both.
